title: Julia Garner May Play Anna Delvey In Shondaland Netflix Show
text:
Photo: Rachel Luna/Getty Images

Julia Garner is an Emmy winner, but she might also be a master scammer. According to Collider, the actress is reportedly in talks for the role of Anna Delvey (real name Anna Sorkin) in a Netflix series about the infamous New York City hustler. The streaming giant has not commented on the news, and “sources caution that Garner does not have an official deal in place, though they add that she is already rearranging her schedule to accommodate the Delvey project.” It was announced last year that Shonda Rhimes secured the rights to the New York Magazine story “How Anna Delvey Tricked New York’s Party People,” which the super-producer will make under her overall deal with Netflix. Hopefully Garner is already practicing telling a New York Times reporter, “I’m not a good person” as she circles the role.
description: Julia Garner is reportedly in talks to play Anna Delvey in the Shonda Rhimes-produced Netflix series about the scammer queen.
